plot: Following a broken heart and his best friend as they attempt to murder the ex-girlfriends new boyfriend, in order to win her back.
title: Crazy Little Thing
plot_es: Following a broken heart and his best friend as they attempt to murder the ex-girlfriends new boyfriend, in order to win her back.
plot_en: Following a broken heart and his best friend as they attempt to murder the ex-girlfriends new boyfriend, in order to win her back.
